r.s: Drawing graphs out of numerical data (traffic, money, ...)
r.d: Features: - drawing graphs in various formats (line, bar, points marked by squares/diamonds/triangles/...) - multiple graphs in one diagram - up to 2 Y-axes - flexible Y-value-output-customisation - variable ticks for the Y-axes - flexible fill-elements - grid-support - alpha-channel-support - ...
r.n: - splitted package into smaller classes to get a more intuitive API - improved API a lot now that it's possible to be more flexible due to improved OO - renamed marker "rhomb" to "diamond" - applied new directory-structure for package (as defined by the core-group) - added workarounds for better results with current Image_Text v0.2
